
#installing packages in R
install.packages("LiblineaR")



#browsing a link in R
browseURL("https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-patched/R-admin.html")

#gives list of all the packages installed
library()


#imported packages in the code
search()

#importing a package in R
require("LiblineaR")

#removing a pacakge from the code space
detach("package:LiblineaR",unload=True)


#uninstalling a package in R
remove.packages("LiblineaR")


#get information about package in R
?iris
